org.sibermatica.lang.function.FailableConsumer

Packages that use FailableConsumer
Package
Description
org.sibermatica.lang.concurrent.locks
Provides support classes for multi-threaded programming.
org.sibermatica.lang.function
Provides functional interfaces to complement those in java.lang.function and utilities for working with Java 8 lambdas.
org.sibermatica.lang.stream
Provides utility classes to complement those in java.util.stream.
org.sibermatica.lang.time
Provides classes and methods to work with dates and durations.
